targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "ping" and
    r._field == "avg" and
    r.target == "virtualelephant.com"
  )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "virtualelephant.com" }))

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "ping" and
    r._field == "avg" and
    r.target == "8.8.8.8"
  )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "8.8.8.8" }))

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "ping" and
    r._field == "avg" and
    r.target == "1.1.1.1"
  )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "1.1.1.1" }))

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "ping" and
    r._field == "avg" and
    r.target == "75.75.75.75"
  )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "75.75.75.75" }))

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "monitoring",
  tag: "host",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "system_metrics",
  start: -30d
)
  |> count()

import "strings"

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    strings.hasPrefix(v: r._field, prefix: "cpu_core_")
  )
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "_field")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r._field == "memory_total_mb"
  )
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r._field == "load_avg_1m"
  )
  |> yield(name: "load_avg_1m_all_hosts")

panels.title: 1m Load Avg for All Linux Hosts

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "cisco_devices" and
    r.device == "10.1.10.2" and
    r.interface == "Ethernet1/2" and
    r._field == "in_octets"
  )
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 8.0 / 1000000.0 }))

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "cisco_devices" and
    r.device == "10.1.10.2" and
    r.interface == "Ethernet1/2" and
    r._field == "out_octets"
  )
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 8.0 / 1000000.0 }))

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)  // Recent window
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "snmp_monitor_runtime" and
    r._field == "poll_duration_seconds" and
    r.device == "10.1.10.2"
  )
  |> last()

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "snmp_monitor_runtime" and
    r._field == "poll_duration_seconds"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r.device == "10.1.10.2" or r.device == "10.1.10.3"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "poll_duration")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)  // Recent window
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "snmp_monitor_runtime" and
    r._field == "poll_duration_seconds" and
    r.device == "10.1.10.3"
  )
  |> last()

targets.expr: sum(rabbitmq_queue_messages_ready * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster) rabbitmq_identity_info{rabbitmq_cluster="$rabbitmq_cluster", namespace="$namespace", rabbitmq_endpoint="$endpoint"})

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "cisco_system_metrics" and
    r.device == "10.1.10.2" and
    r._field == "cpu_load_percent"

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "cisco_system_metrics" and
    r.device == "10.1.10.2" and

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "cisco_system_metrics" and
    r.device == "10.1.10.3" and
    r._field == "cpu_load_percent"
  )

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "cisco_system_metrics" and
    r.device == "10.1.10.3" and
    r._field == "memory_usage_percent"
  )

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "cisco_devices" and
    (r.device == "10.1.10.2" or r.device == "10.1.10.3") and
    r.interface == "Ethernet1/48" and
    r._field == "in_octets"
  )
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 8.0 / 1000000.0 }))

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "cisco_devices" and
    (r.device == "10.1.10.2" or r.device == "10.1.10.3") and
    r.interface == "Ethernet1/48" and
    r._field == "out_octets"
  )
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 8.0 / 1000000.0 * -1.0 }))
